entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 48 %

Dewpoint: -33.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
